remarks: Unequal spans are disjoint (share only the zero vector).  (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lspdisj2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspdisj2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspdisj2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspdisj2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspdisj2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspdisj2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspdisj2.q $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspdisj2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { X } ) i^i ( N ` { Y } ) ) = { .0. } ) $.
